## WhereUsedListInfo type

Additional information for the entries in a Where Used list.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type WhereUsedListInfo = ListInfo & {
    Comment?: string;
    CommentToken?: WhereUsedCommentToken;
    Versions?: Array<number>;
};
```
